        public static void dismissAllDialogs(@NonNull

      • showDialogAllowingStateLoss

        public static void showDialogAllowingStateLoss(@NonNull
                                               android.support.v4.app.FragmentManager fragmentManager,
                                               @NonNull
                                               android.support.v4.app.DialogFragment dialogFragment,
                                               @Nullable
                                               java.lang.String tag)
        Allows to show a dialogfragment even after Activity.onSaveInstanceState(Bundle) was called (basically after Activity.onPause(). The dialog will be visible if you return back. It will be not visible in case you display the dialog after onPause AND the process is killed.
        Parameters:
        fragmentManager - fragmentManager
        dialogFragment - dialogFragment
        tag - tag

      • isAppInForeground

        public static boolean isAppInForeground(@NonNull
                                        android.content.Context context)
        Parameters:
        context - Android application context.
        Returns:
        true if application is in foreground.

      • parseFloat

        public static java.lang.Float parseFloat(@NonNull
                                         java.lang.String floatStr)
        Parse a decimal number entered by user, accept both decimal point and comma

      • localizeDecimalEditText

        public static void localizeDecimalEditText(@NonNull
                                           android.widget.EditText editText)
        Workaround instead standard numberDecimal inputType which ignores localization. Enforce localized decimal numbers on input.
        Parameters:
        editText - EditText to be localized to accept only decimal numbers
